class.name: xbkProgressBar
class.desc: The xbkProgressBar class provides visual feedback to users about the progress of task, such as loading an application or querying a database.

param.name: inst
param.comment: The name or id to be use for this xbkProgressBar.

param.name: parent
param.comment: The parent of the xbkProgressBar object if it has one.

method.name: setStyleClass
method.method_desc: Set the style className for the current xbkProgessBar

param.name: startStyleClass
param.comment: The style class name for the start.

param.name: endStyleClass
param.comment: The style class name for the end.

param.name: num
param.comment: Use the number 1-100 to represent the percent.
